ygData.subject: Paladins
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings, I was hoping someone could talk to me about the Pros and Cons of a Paladin vs. a straight Warrior class.  I am currently playing a Warrior in the
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings,

I was hoping someone could talk to me about the Pros and Cons of
a Paladin vs. a straight Warrior class. I am currently playing a
Warrior in the beta, and thinking seriously about playing a Paladin. I
realize that Fighters will be able to take and give more punishment
then any other class, and perhaps slightly more HP. Does anyone
have a point of view on this? I would really appreciate any advice
you may give.


Thanks,

Mark

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
A man says to the Unverse,'Sir, I exist.'
Mark E. Davis The Universe replied,'However that
Mark@... does not create in me any sense of
obligation.' --Stephen Crane
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
